data.name: Space Fox Kimi - A Very Kimi Christmas
data.detailed_description:
It's that time of year where humans celebrate the special holiday known as "Christmas". This year however, is different. It is the first year that mankind has a group of special guests from another world.

What will the visitors from the Galactic Foxian Empire do in this holy night?

This is another short silly side story made in a few days. It is non-canon, though it would take place sometime during Chapter 5 of the main game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
